channel.title: Auto restarter problems
channel.description: ok i set ive tried many auto restarters ok so i start it and set it to restart every thirty mins and at thirty mins this is what happens another cmd pops up trying to restart my server but the other servers cmd is still up so it fails and says server already in use so it doesnt restart. is there any way to fix this or can i just add to my source an auto restarter built into it? please help

item.title: Auto restarter problems
item.dc:creator: @mellen mellen
item.description:
@mellen wrote:

ok i set ive tried many auto restarters ok so i start it and set it to restart every thirty mins and at thirty mins this is what happens another cmd pops up trying to restart my server but the other servers cmd is still up so it fails and says server already in use so it doesnt restart. is there any way to fix this or can i just add to my source an auto restarter built into it? please help
